description: This file defines a React functional component 'LoginPage' that renders a login screen with email and password inputs, social login buttons, and associated UI elements. It uses React hooks for state management and handles form submission with a mock authentication logic.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login interface with email/password inputs and social login options.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, triggers onLogin callback with email and password length if provided.
